PDF image rendering in Author mode

body.p: Starting with version 20.0, provides built-in support for rendering PDF images in Author mode and PDF output. For previous versions, they are not rendered by default and you need to add the Apache PDFBox library by using one of the following procedures:

section.title: Manually Adding the ApachePDFBox Libraries
section.p:
To manually add the Apache PDFBox library so that PDF images are rendered in Author mode, follow this procedure:
Go to and download the pre-built PDFBox standalone binary JAR files: pdfbox-2.0.3.jar, fontbox-2.0.3.jar, and xmpbox-2.0.3.jar. Alternatively, you can use the 1.8.12 version of these files, as they have been tested and work properly.It is not recommended to use pdfbox-app-2.0.3.jar file instead of the three specified files because it contains additional classes that may cause conflicts elsewhere in .
Create a subfolder called pdfImageJars in the \lib directory.
Copy the downloaded JAR libraries to that newly created subfolder.
Open OXYGEN_PLUGIN_DIR/META-INF/MANIFEST.MF and add a reference to the JAR libraries in the Bundle-ClassPath entry.
Restart the application.Restart Eclipse in clean mode (edit the shortcut you use to start Eclipse and add -clean as the first argument.)
